mapper.insert: insert into board (num, writer, title, content, reg_date, readcount, boardnum, files, tablenum) values(board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{readcount}, #{boardnum}, #{files}, #{tablenum} )
mapper.select: select * from (select b.*, rownum r from (select * from board where tablenum=30 order by reg_date desc) b) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select count(*) from board where tablenum=30
